addBeanPostInstantiation

boolean addBeanPostInstantiation(java.lang.Object instance)
Appends the specified BeanPostInstantiation to the end of this processor's managed list.

Parameters:
instance - BeanPostInstantiation to be appended to this list
Returns:
true if the processor's managed list changed as a result of the call

addBeanPostInstantiation

Appends all of the BeanPostInstantiations in the specified collection to the end of this processor's managed list.

Returns:
true if the processor's managed list changed as a result of the call

addBeanPostInstantiation

                                 java.util.Collection<java.lang.Object> collection)

Parameters:
index - index at which to insert the first element from the specified collection

Returns:
true if the processor's managed list changed as a result of the call

removeBeanPostInstantiation

java.lang.Object removeBeanPostInstantiation(int index)
Removes the specified BeanPostInstantiation at the specified position.

Parameters:

Returns:
returns the specified BeanPostInstantiation was removed.

removeBeanPostInstantiation

boolean removeBeanPostInstantiation(java.lang.Object obj)
Removes the specified BeanPostInstantiation.

Parameters:
obj - the instance of BeanPostInstantiation to be removed, if present.
Returns:
true if this list contained the specified BeanPostInstantiation
